testCase.name: CardComponent should render default with a border shadow
CardComponent should render with a border solid with input "solid"
CardComponent should render with a border dashed with input "dashed"
CardHeaderComponent should create card header component
LinkComponent should render link with size medium
CardFooterComponent should create card footer component
CardContentComponent should create card content component
CardContentComponent should render a content without scroll
CardContentComponent should render a content scroll with default 200px
CardContentComponent should render a content scroll and contentScrollHeight with 100px
CardContentComponent should render a content scroll without scroll and with contentScrollHeight 100px, when scroll is false, so height is auto
